name: Elmer Clark
text: This is absolutely one of the tastiest restaurants in the region. Every time I come to this place I am awfully satisfied. They preserve their high  level service and the topmost level of food  they provide. You no doubt will love this place. Highly  recommended.

name: Preston Burford
text: Would absolutely recommend trying this spot. Exceptional vibes, delicious food, good customer service. Keep up the good work.

name: Marc McKevitz
text: I ordered a 2 topping two fer. When I got home, I opened it up and there was EVERYTHING on it and not 2 items. This should have had 2 items on it only.

name: erin hill
text: I go here probably 3 times a week and the staff is always excellent and efficient, pizza is always perfect, make time is always consistent. Management is doing a great job!

name: Jolene Lynch
text: I can order online at home, pay with my card and be in and out of the store picking it up and back home all within 30 minutes! They even have a little app thing that you can see the status of your pizza as its made üòÅ super fun for kids.
